*This attraction is seasonal.

The New York City Explorer Pass® is the best choice for maximum savings and flexibility. Save up to 50% off retail prices on admission to 3, 4, 5, 7, or 10 attractions of your choice from over 40 choices. Enjoy the flexibility to choose attractions as you go and take up to 30 days to use your pass. Attractions include a hop-on hop-off bus tour, Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island ferry ticket, Empire State Building, Top of the Rock, The Met, and more.

 Included Attractions: Top of the Rock Observatory, Empire State Building, Hop-On Hop-Off Big Bus New York: Classic 1-Day Tour, Statue of Liberty & Ellis Island Immigration Museum - Ferry Ticket, American Museum of Natural History, The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), 9/11 Tribute Museum & Walking Tour, The Met, Landmark Cruise: Circle Line Sightseeing, Central Park Bike Rental: Full Day, Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum and Space Shuttle, Night Tour by Big Bus New York, Yankee Stadium: Classic Tour, The RIDE, The TOUR, Ripley's Believe It or Not!® Times Square, Guggenheim Museum, The Met Breuer, Lady Liberty Cruise: Circle Line Sightseeing, Woodbury Common Bus Tour (Round Trip + VIP Coupon Booklet), Harbor Lights Cruise: Circle Line Sightseeing, Rockefeller Center Tour, Radio City Stage Door Tour®, Best of NYC Cruise: Circle Line Sightseeing (Upgrade fee applies), Ground Zero Museum Workshop: Hands-On 9/11 Tour, Shearwater Classic Schooner Sail (Daytime Statue Sail)*, Clipper City Tall Ship Sail (Daytime Statue or Harbor Lights)*, Food On Foot Tours, Central Park Walking Tour, Central Park Bike Tour, Brooklyn Bridge Bike Tour, New York Water Taxi: All-Day Access Pass, Madison Square Garden®: All Access Tour™, NYC TV & Movie Bus Tour by On Location Tours, When Harry Met Seinfeld Bus Tour by On Location Tours, BEAST Speedboat Ride: Circle Line Sightseeing*, Museum of Sex, Central Park TV & Movie Sites Walking Tour, Lincoln Center Tour, Gossip Girl Sites Bus Tour by On Location Tours, New York Historical Society Museum, The Whitney Museum of American Art, Brooklyn Bridge and DUMBO Walking Tour, Luna Park at Coney Island: All Day Wristband*, Brooklyn Bridge Sightseeing: Full-Day Bike Rental, Sopranos Sites Bus Tour by On
